content.query:
CREATE VIEW dbo.vw_Site AS
SELECT
     s.[id_site]
    ,s.[code_site]
    ,s.[site]
    ,s.[code_parent]
    ,s.[type_site]
    ,s.[code_activite]
    ,s.[activite]
    ,s.[societe]
 FROM
    [dbo].[Site] s
    inner join (select max([date_integration]) [date_integration] from [dbo].[Site]) d
        on d.[date_integration] = s.[date_integration]
